pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convenient Functions for Ensemble Time Series Forecasts // Convenient functions for ensemble forecasts in R combining approaches from the 'forecast' package. Forecasts generated from auto.arima(), ets(), thetam(), nnetar(), stlm(), and tbats() can be combined with equal weights, weights based on in-sample errors, or CV weights. Cross validation for time series data and user-supplied models and forecasting functions is also supported to evaluate model accuracy.
